title: What is the hypnotic crisis? Demonstration/ Non-verbal hypnosis with Dr. Paret
description:
Dr. Marco Paret will explain to you what is hypnotic crisis and you will see a demonstration. Crisis are very good for big problems, big issues. Strong traumas get solved very easily with crisis. Crisis is the key to freedom. Freedom of the spirit and the non-verbal is the key to the best self. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
